TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PagesSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class PagesSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 提供对配置文件的 pages 部分的编程访问。

span.span: Provides programmatic access to the pages section of the configuration file.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一种以编程方式访问和修改配置文件[页](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/950xf363(v=vs.100))的内容的方法。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the configuration file [pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/950xf363(v=vs.100)) section. 此配置节支持为配置文件范围内的所有页面和控件全局设置某些 ASP.NET 页面和控制指令。This configuration section supports setting certain ASP.NET page and control directives globally for all pages and controls in the scope of the configuration file. 这包括 `@ Page` 指令、通过 集合属性的 `@ Import` 指令以及通过 集合属性的 `@ Register` 指令。This includes the `@ Page` directive, the `@ Import` directive through the collection property, and the `@ Register` directive through the collection property. 它还支持在运行时通过 集合属性将标记类型映射到其他标记类型。It also provides support for mapping tag types to other tag types at run time through the collection property. 指令指定页和用户控件编译器在处理 ASP.NET Web 窗体页（.aspx）和用户控件（.ascx）文件时使用的设置。Directives specify settings used by the page and user-control compilers when they process ASP.NET Web Forms page (.aspx) and user control (.ascx) files. ## Examples 此示例演示如何以声明方式为 `pages` 节的几个属性指定值，也可以将这些属性作为 类的成员进行访问。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `pages` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式为[pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/950xf363(v=vs.100))节指定值。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the [pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/950xf363(v=vs.100)) section. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#1)]

span.span: Directives for Web Forms Pages

summary.span: 使用默认设置初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 使用 方法获取 类的实例。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在异步页处理过程中等待异步处理程序完成的秒数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of seconds to wait for an asynchronous handler to complete during asynchronous page processing.

value.span: 一个 值，指示在异步页处理过程中等待异步处理程序完成的时间量（以秒为单位）。

span.span: A value indicating the amount of time in seconds to wait for an asynchronous handler to complete during asynchronous page processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为45秒。The default value is 45 seconds.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoEventWireup { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoEventWireup : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 页的事件是否自动连接到事件处理函数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether events for ASP.NET pages are automatically connected to event-handling functions.

value.span: 如果 ASP.NET 页的事件自动连接到事件处理函数，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if events for ASP.NET pages are automatically connected to event-handling functions; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true` 时，ASP.NET 不要求你将事件处理程序显式绑定到页面事件（如 ）。When is `true`, ASP.NET does not require that you explicitly bind event handlers to a page event such as . `false` 时，必须将事件显式绑定到方法。When is `false`, you must explicitly bind the event to a method. 例如，如果在代码中有一个用于页的 `Page_Load` 方法，则仅当你在下面的示例中编写如下所示的代码（注意中的 `Handles` Visual Basic 语句和中的事件处理程序代码）时，才会调用方法来响应 事件 C# ：For example, if you have a `Page_Load` method in the code for a page, the method will be called in response to the event only if you write code like that in the following example (notice the `Handles` statement in Visual Basic and the event handler code in C#): ```vb Partial Class AutoEventWireupExample Inherits System.Web.UI.Page Protected Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load Response.Write("Executing Page_Load") End Sub End Class ``` ```csharp public partial class AutoEventWireupExample : System.Web.UI.Page { protected void Page_Load(object sender, System.EventArgs e) { Response.Write("Executing Page_Load"); } override protected void OnInit(EventArgs e) { this.Load += new System.EventHandler(this.Page_Load); } } ``` `true` 时，处理程序将基于其名称和签名自动绑定到运行时的事件。When is `true`, handlers are automatically bound to events at run time based on their name and signature. 对于每个事件，ASP.NET 会根据模式 `Page_`*事件*名称搜索指定的方法，如 `Page_Load` 或 `Page_Init`。For each event, ASP.NET searches for a method that is named according to the pattern `Page_`*eventname*, such as `Page_Load` or `Page_Init`. ASP.NET 首先检查具有典型事件处理程序签名的重载（也就是说，它指定 和 参数）。ASP.NET checks first for an overload that has the typical event-handler signature (that is, it specifies and parameters). 如果找不到具有此签名的事件处理程序，ASP.NET 将检查是否有没有参数的重载。If an event handler with this signature is not found, ASP.NET checks for an overload that has no parameters. `false` 时，必须将事件处理程序显式绑定到事件，如前面的示例中所示。When is `false`, you must explicitly bind event handlers to events, as shown in the preceding example. 在这种情况下，方法名称不必遵循模式。In that case, the method names do not have to follow a pattern. 如果未在 `@ Page` 指令中指定 ，则默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true` if is not specified in the `@ Page` directive. 当 Visual Studio 创建代码隐藏文件时，它会自动包含特性。Visual Studio automatically includes the attribute when it creates code-behind files. 对于用编写的 ASP.NET 页面 C# ，Visual Studio 会将值设置为 `true`。For ASP.NET pages written in C#, Visual Studio sets the value to `true`. 对于 Visual Basic，Visual Studio 会将值设置为 `false`，因为处理程序是使用[Handles](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/handles-clause)关键字绑定到事件的，它会在生成事件处理程序时由 Visual Studio 自动插入。For Visual Basic, Visual Studio sets the value to `false` because handlers are bound to events by using the [Handles](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/handles-clause) keyword, which is inserted automatically by Visual Studio when it generates an event handler. 如果将 设置为 `true`，则可以省略（或删除） [Handles](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/handles-clause)关键字。If you set to `true`, you can omit (or remove) the [Handles](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/handles-clause) keyword. 不要将 设置为 `true` 是否需要考虑性能。Do not set to `true` if performance is a key consideration. 启用自动事件绑定时，ASP.NET 必须介于15和30之间，尝试将事件与方法进行匹配。When automatic event wireup is enabled, ASP.NET must make between 15 and 30 tries to match events with methods. 请注意以下有关将事件处理程序绑定到事件的内容：Note the following about binding event handlers to events: - 如果将 设置为 `true`，请确保不要将页面事件处理程序手动附加到事件。If you set to `true`, make sure that you do not also manually attach page event handlers to events. 如果这样做，则可能会多次调用处理程序。If you do, handlers might be called more than one time. - 仅对页面事件执行自动绑定，而不是针对页面上的控件的事件执行。Automatic binding is performed only for page events, not for events for controls on the page. - 作为将事件绑定到处理程序的替代方法，您可以重写页面或控件的 `On`*事件名*方法。As an alternative to binding events to handlers, you can override the `On`*eventname* methods of the page or of controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在代码中设置或读取 属性。The following code example shows how to set or read the property in code. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#9)] 下面的示例演示当 `true` 时，自动附加到页面事件的两种形式的方法签名。The following example shows the two forms of method signatures that are automatically attached to page events when is `true`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/Default.aspx#50)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/Default2.aspx.cs#50)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/Default.aspx#50)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/Default2.aspx.vb#50)] 下面的示例演示如何在 `false` 时显式绑定事件。The following example shows how to explicitly wire up events when is `false`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/Default.aspx.cs#51)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/Default.aspx.vb#51)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 .aspx 页和 .ascx 控件是否使用响应缓冲。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether .aspx pages and .ascx controls use response buffering.

value.span: 如果 .aspx 页和 .ascx 控件使用响应缓冲，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if .aspx pages and .ascx controls use response buffering; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 打开响应缓冲时，将缓冲页面或控件输出，直到处理完整个页面或控制。When response buffering is turned on, the page or control output is buffered until after the entire page or control is processed. 不要将 设置为 `true` 是否需要考虑性能。Do not set to `true` if performance is a key consideration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. public: property bool EnableEventValidation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EnableEventValidation : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否启用事件验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether event validation is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用事件验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if event validation is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否应执行事件验证。The attribute indicates whether event validation should be performed. 默认值是 `true`。The default value is `true`. Web 应用程序可以选择禁用事件验证以还原到 .NET Framework 版本1.0 行为。A Web application can optionally disable event validation to revert to .NET Framework version 1.0 behavior. 基本控件将检查此特性，以确定它是否应该验证事件。The base control checks this attribute to determine whether it should validate events. 派生的控件不继承此基控件属性，因此默认情况下它不会被事件验证。A derived control does not inherit this base control attribute, and so it is exempt from event validation by default. 你仍可通过将 特性添加到派生控件本身并将其设置为 `true`来指示 ASP.NET 对派生控件执行事件验证。You still instruct ASP.NET to perform event validation on the derived control by adding the attribute to the derived control itself and setting it to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 事件验证可降低未经授权的回发请求和回调的风险。Event validation reduces the risk of unauthorized postback requests and callbacks. 它指示 ASP.NET 仅验证可在回发请求或回调期间在控件中引发的事件。It instructs ASP.NET to validate only those events that can be raised in the control during a postback request or callback. 使用此模型时，控件在呈现期间注册其事件，并在回发或回拨处理期间验证事件。With this model, a control registers its events during rendering and then validates the events during the post-back or callback handling. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 中的所有事件驱动型控件都使用此功能。All event-driven controls in ASP.NET use this feature by default.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableViewStateMac { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EnableViewStateMac : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定当页从客户端回发时，ASP.NET 是否应在页的视图状态上运行消息验证代码 (MAC)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether ASP.NET should run a message authentication code (MAC) on the page's view state when the page is posted back from the client.

value.span: 如果页从客户端回发时，ASP.NET 应在页的视图状态上运行消息验证代码 (MAC)，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if ASP.NET should run a message authentication code (MAC) on the page's view state when the page is posted back from the client; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态 MAC 是隐藏变量的加密版本，当页面发送到浏览器时，该页的视图状态将保存到该变量中。A view-state MAC is an encrypted version of the hidden variable that a page's view state is persisted to when the page is sent to the browser. 如果将此属性设置为 "`true`"，则会检查加密的视图状态，以确认它在客户端上未被篡改。When this property is set to `true`, the encrypted view state is checked to verify that it has not been tampered with on the client. > [!IMPORTANT] > 即使应用程序或页面不使用视图状态，也不应将此属性设置为在生产网站中 `false`。This attribute should never be set to `false` in a production Web site, even if the application or page does not use view state. 视图状态 MAC 有助于确保其他 ASP.NET 函数的安全性以及视图状态。The view state MAC helps ensure the security of other ASP.NET functions in addition to the view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IgnoreDeviceFilters As IgnoreDeviceFilterElementCollection

summary.span: 获取 ASP.NET 在呈现页面时应忽略的设备标记的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of device tags that ASP.NET should ignore when it renders a page.

value.span: ASP.NET 应忽略的设备标记的集合。

span.span: The collection of device tags that ASP.NET should ignore.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要忽略的设备标记被指定为 HTML 命名空间前缀，它们应在浏览器中传递，而不是由 ASP.NET 处理。Device tags to ignore are specified as HTML namespace prefixes that should be passed as they are to the browser instead of being processed by ASP.NET. 例如，用于 Microsoft Ajax 元素的 `sys` 前缀。An example is the `sys` prefix that is used for Microsoft Ajax elements.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page scroll position should be maintained upon returning from a postback from the server.

value.span: 如果在回发后应保持页滚动位置，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the page-scroll position should be maintained after postback; otherwise, .

summary.span: 获取或设置单个视图状态字段可以包含的最大字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters that a single view-state field can contain.

value.span: 单个视图状态字段可以包含的最大字符数。

span.span: The maximum number of characters that a single view-state field can contain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呈现页面或控件时，页面和控件视图状态将存储在隐藏视图状态字段中。Page and control view state is stored in hidden view-state fields when the page or control is rendered. 如果存储的数据的长度超出 值，则会在多个视图状态字段之间拆分数据。If the length of the data stored exceeds the value, then the data is split between multiple view-state fields. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象对应于 ASP.NET 页上的 `@ Import` 指令。The objects correspond to the `@ Import` directive on an ASP.NET page. `Import` 指令允许指定自动导入到应用程序的所有页中的命名空间。The `Import` directive allows you to specify namespaces that are automatically imported into all the pages of an application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定分析器筛选器类型。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the parser filter type.

value.span: 一个指定分析器筛选器类型的字符串。

span.span: A string that specifies the parser filter type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分析器筛选器是 类的实例，在分析步骤之前由页面编译过程调用，以允许在运行时对源代码进行更改。A parser filter, which is an instance of the class, is called by the page compilation process before the parsing step to allow for changes to the source code at run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderAllHiddenFieldsAtTopOfForm { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RenderAllHiddenFieldsAtTopOfForm : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否系统生成的所有隐藏域都呈现在表单的顶部。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether all system-generated hidden fields are rendered at the top of the form.

value.span: 如果系统生成的隐藏域呈现在表单的顶部，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if system-generated hidden fields are rendered at the top of the form; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为

span.span: The default is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 属性指定在窗体末尾呈现一些系统生成的隐藏字段。You can use the property to specify that some system-generated hidden fields are rendered at the end of the form. 在早于 .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 的 ASP.NET 版本中，ASP.NET 将在窗体顶部呈现一些隐藏字段（例如，`__VIEWSTATE`）。In versions of ASP.NET earlier than the .NET Framework 3.5 SP1, ASP.NET renders some hidden fields (for example, `__VIEWSTATE`) at the top of the form. 其他隐藏字段（例如 `__EVENTVALIDATION`）呈现在窗体底部附近，紧靠在关闭 `` 标记之前。Other hidden fields (for example, `__EVENTVALIDATION`) are rendered near the bottom of the form, just before the closing `` tag. 默认情况下，在 ASP.NET 3.5 SP1 中，所有系统生成的隐藏字段都呈现在页面顶部。By default, in ASP.NET 3.5 SP1, all system-generated hidden fields are rendered at the top of the page. 这可以确保这些字段中的信息会发送到服务器，即使在页面加载完成之前执行了回发也是如此。This makes sure that the information in these fields is sent to the server even if a postback is performed before the page has finished loading. 如果 设置为 `false`，则在页面加载完成之前执行回发可能导致 "回发或回调参数无效" 错误。If is set to `false`, performing a postback before the page has finished loading can cause an "Invalid postback or callback argument" error. > [!NOTE] > 尽管属性名称指示 "所有隐藏字段"，但用户创建的隐藏字段不受此属性的设置影响。Although the property name indicates "all hidden fields," user-created hidden fields are not affected by settings for this property.

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅脚本侵入概述。

span.span: For more information, see Script Exploits Overview.

value.span: 如果 ASP.NET 针对危险值检查来自浏览器的输入，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if ASP.NET examines input from the browser for dangerous values; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请求验证的执行方式是将所有输入数据与潜在危险值的列表进行比较。Request validation is performed by comparing all input data to a list of potentially dangerous values. 如果出现匹配项，ASP.NET 将引发 。If a match occurs, ASP.NET raises an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::ViewStateEncryptionMode ViewStateEncryptionMode { System::Web::UI::ViewStateEncryptionMode get(); void set(System::Web::UI::ViewStateEncryptionMode value); };
member this.ViewStateEncryptionMode : System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 ASP.NET 在保留 值时所使用的加密模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the encryption mode that ASP.NET uses when maintaining values.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，指示 值在何时加密。

span.span: A enumeration value indicating when the values are encrypted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的 枚举值为 `Always`、`Auto`和 `Never`。The possible enumeration values are `Always`, `Auto`, and `Never`. 默认值是 `Auto`。The default value is `Auto`. 如果 属性设置为 `Auto`，则当控件请求它时将加密 `ViewState`。If property is set to `Auto`, `ViewState` will be encrypted when a control requests it.
